comment:
CR-056 Pre-Review - COMPLIANT

**Frontmatter Verified:**
- title: "Multi-Agent Container Session Infrastructure"
- revision_summary: "Initial draft" (acceptable for v0.1 per SOP-002 Section 8)

**CR Content Requirements (SOP-002 Section 6) - All Present:**
- Section 1 (Purpose): Clear problem statement
- Section 2 (Scope): Context, Changes Summary, Files Affected complete
- Section 3 (Current State): Present tense declarative statements
- Section 4 (Proposed State): Present tense declarative statements
- Section 5 (Change Description): Detailed technical specification with subsections
- Section 6 (Justification): Problem, impact, and solution documented
- Section 7 (Impact Assessment): Files, Documents, Other impacts complete
- Section 8 (Testing Summary): Five test cases (T1-T5) defined
- Section 9 (Implementation Plan): Six-phase implementation plan
- Section 10 (Execution): EI table with 7 execution items
- Section 11 (Execution Summary): Placeholder present (acceptable for pre-execution)
- Section 12 (References): SOP-001, SOP-002, and session documents

**Compliance Checks:**
- No TBD/TODO/FIXME/XXX placeholders in pre-approved content (Sections 1-9)
- Execution section placeholders ([SUMMARY], [Pass/Fail], etc.) acceptable per SOP-002 Section 6
- Section numbering consistent
- Formatting consistent throughout
- No typos found
- Tables properly formatted
- Code blocks properly enclosed

Document is ready for pre-approval.

QA POST-REVIEW: CR-056 v1.4 -- RECOMMEND. FRONTMATTER: title='Multi-Agent Container Session Infrastructure' (present). revision_summary='Final execution with all three VARs referenced and resolved' (updated, accurate). PRE-APPROVED CONTENT: Sections 1-9 present per SOP-002 Section 6 (Purpose, Scope, Current State, Proposed State, Change Description, Justification, Impact Assessment, Testing Summary, Implementation Plan). EXECUTION ITEMS (7 of 7): EI-1 (.gitignore) Pass, EI-2 (docker-compose) Pass, EI-3 (claude-session.sh) Pass, EI-4 (multi-agent-session.sh) Pass, EI-5 (inbox-watcher.py) Pass, EI-6 (end-to-end test) Pass, EI-7 (README) Pass. All have Execution Summary, Task Outcome, Performed By-Date filled. Evidence: commit f5f2cfe cited for EI-1 through EI-5 and EI-7; EI-6 describes test methodology and references VAR-001. EXECUTION COMMENTS: 8 comments tracing full execution chronology, final comment summarizes all three VARs. EXECUTION SUMMARY (Section 11): Comprehensive narrative referencing all three VARs with types and statuses. Inbox watcher injection gap honestly disclosed with VAR-003 reference. VAR BLOCKING CONDITIONS (SOP-004 S10 / SOP-002 S7.3): CR-056-VAR-001 Type 1 stated CLOSED, verified CLOSED v2.0. CR-056-VAR-002 Type 1 stated CLOSED, verified CLOSED v2.0. CR-056-VAR-003 Type 2 stated PRE_APPROVED, verified PRE_APPROVED v1.0. All blocks cleared. CR-057 stated CLOSED, verified CLOSED v2.0. DOCUMENTATION (SOP-002 S7.3 item 3): Only docker/README.md affected, not a controlled QMS document. No controlled docs require approval. SDLC (SOP-002 S7.3 item 5): Infrastructure CR, no SDLC system affected. REFERENCES (Section 12): All four document cross-references verified against live QMS. PLACEHOLDER CHECK: Zero found. FORMATTING: No typos, consistent throughout, sequential numbering. DETERMINATION: COMPLIANT.
